oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ordnance report for Co. A, 11th Tenn. Cav., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ordnance report for Co. A, 11th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. The report appears to be written on the back of a court case file, an example of reusing paper at hand. The report is filed and signed by Ordinance Seargent G. C. Perdew. The list includes 19 unserviceable Austrian rifles, 1600 rounds of ammunition, Enfield rifles, and unserviceable US altered muskets. Found in Grainger County Chancery file 1867, Parrott v. Shields.
